Song.title: Doxology
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Thomas Ken Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Praise [E]God, from whom all [A]bles[B]sings [E/G#]flow; [ | E/G# |] Praise [C#m]Him, all creatures [A]here [E]be[Bsus4]low; [| Bsus4 |] Praise [E]Him above, ye [A/C#]heaven[B/D#]ly [C#m]host; [| C#m |] Praise [E/G#]Father, [F#m7]Son, and [Bsus]Ho[B]ly [E]Ghost. [| E | A | A |]
Ending: [A | A |]A[E | E |]men (repeat)
Arrangement.searchtext: praise god from whom all blessings flow praise him all creatures here below praise him above ye heavenly host praise father son and holy ghost ending amen repeat
praise god from whom all blessings flow praise him all creatures here below praise him above ye heavenly host praise father son and holy ghost
praise god from whom all blessings flow praise him all creatures here below praise him above ye heavenly host praise father son and holy ghost 3x
